scenario.name: new_script
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "Факс G711 c mp_profile (TAU style wout rtpmap)" <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 1000 1000 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=A conversation c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8
ACK sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0
SIP/2.0 488 Not Acceptable Here [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: 0

SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] Contact: sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 1000 1001 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=A conversation c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 0
